remarks: Lemma for ~ 4atexlem7 .  Show that when ` C = S ` , ` D ` satisfies the existence condition of the consequent.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2012.)
statement:
4thatlem.ph $e |- ( ph <-> ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( S e. A /\ ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W /\ ( P .\/ R ) = ( Q .\/ R ) ) /\ ( T e. A /\ ( U .\/ T ) = ( V .\/ T ) ) ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ -. S .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) ) $.
4thatlem0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
4thatlem0.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
4thatlem0.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
4thatlem0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
4thatlem0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
4thatlem0.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
4thatlem0.v $e |- V = ( ( P .\/ S ) ./\ W ) $.
4thatlem0.c $e |- C = ( ( Q .\/ T ) ./\ ( P .\/ S ) ) $.
4thatlem0.d $e |- D = ( ( R .\/ T ) ./\ ( P .\/ S ) ) $.
4atexlemex4 $p |- ( ( ph /\ C = S ) -> E. z e. A ( -. z .<_ W /\ ( P .\/ z ) = ( S .\/ z ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ z $.
$d .\/ z $.
$d A z $.
$d C z $.
$d D z $.
$d P z $.
$d S z $.
$d W z $.
